text:
Hey, I'm tyring to figure out how to build the following:
• a multi-step HubSpot form that will show submitted data from an earlier step in a following step. 
• Current usecase is limited to showing it in text, but I can imagine the use case stretching to inputs (i.e. prepopulation) as well. Example:
    ◦ In step 1, you submit a type of service and a city that you need the service in
    ◦ In step 2, it says "So you're looking for <service> in <city>" in the body text above form fields
• It doesn't have to actually store the intermittent data in HubSpot, but should carry it along to the next step. 
I don't see native functionality in HubSpot for this, but would love to understand if you could easily code this into HubSpot's embedded form script.
